product_name: Marmot Micro G Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: Innovative fabric that's waterproof, windproof and incredibly breathable turns the men's Marmot Micro G Rain Jacket into the ultimate shell for highly aerobic activities. MemBrain(R) FusionDri waterproof, breathable nylon also stretches so you achieve your aim. Center-front and pocket zippers are water-resistant. Adjustable hood, asymmetric cuffs and drawcord hem enhance weather protection. Integrated cooling vents. Marmot Micro G Rain Jacket for men features a trim, athletic fit that won't inhibit movement. Closeout.
short_description: Innovative fabric that's waterproof, windproof and incredibly breathable turns the men's Marmot Micro G Rain Jacket into the ultimate shell for highly aerobic activities.
